title: Corner unit with soaring Seattle skyline views + Balcony
posting_body: ['Please feel free to reach out for touring options!', 'Call us directly at', 'show contact info', 'Check us out online at', '<URL>/', 'Description', "Don't miss an opportunity to make a home along the New Waterfront, as it continues to evolve and develop.", "With new urban parks, bike paths, walkways, and water access—this post-Viaduct neighborhood is set to be the brightest, and most unique mix of modern city living, paired with one of Seattle's most timeless assets, the Salish Sea.", "Wake up to the sound of seagulls and ferry boats in Seattle's Original Neighborhood—historic Pioneer Square.", 'With the Viaduct gone, sunrises and sunsets can now be seen street-level, on Main Street.', 'We also have a rooftop deck with sweeping views of Downtown, the Space Needle, Smith Tower, and the Great Wheel—a great, breezy outdoor place to relax, work-from-home-with-a-view, BBQ or sit, socially distanced, by our fire pit.', 'Situated one block from the streetcar with access to Capitol Hill, five blocks from the bus and light rail service in International District/Chinatown, 80 Main is located in Pioneer Square.', 'Only minutes away from the Financial District and Downtown, this easily walkable location is just one of the reasons why our residents love living at 80 Main.', 'A dramatically designed, seven-story contemporary building that never feels too crowded or chaotic—80 Main is a friendly community—and a pet-friendly building.', 'Quality, upscale touches abound in both apartments and common areas.', 'All apartments have full-size washers/dryers, A/C*, balcony* and modern kitchens and appliances.', "There's elevator service, air-conditioned corridors, and trash chutes, for ease of everyday living.", '*In select units', 'Details', 'Availability date:', '8/12/2022', 'Pets:', 'Cats, Small Dogs (< 25lb), Large Dogs (> 25lb)', 'Pet notes:', 'Pet PolicyDogs and Cats Allowed: No weight restrictions.', 'Requires an additional $300 refundable deposit, Call for more details.•$25', 'Monthly Pet Rent•2 Pet Limit', 'Deposit:', '$300 Refundable Deposit', 'Leasing options:', '12 months', 'Application fee:', '$44.50 per adult', 'Amenities', 'Utilities Cost:', 'Varies with usage.', 'Laundry:', 'In Unit', 'Parking type:', 'Street Parking', 'Appliances:', 'Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Garbage disposal, Microwave, Range/Oven', 'Heating/cooling:', 'Heat: forced air, portable AC port', 'Wiring:', 'Cable-ready, High-speed internet', 'Facilities and Recreation:', 'Rooftop Terrace with Pet Relief Area', 'Security and Access:', 'Elevator, Controlled access', 'Views:', 'City, Water', 'Additional features:', 'Parcel Pending lockers, Non-Smoking Property', 'Offered by:', 'Blanton Turner', '*Photos may be representational of features and finishes and not of the exact unit*', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
